titles.title: To validate and confirm a conveyance of certain real property by the Southern Pacific Transportation Company, successor in interest to Southern Pacific Railroad Company, to the Redevelopment Agency of the city of Tulare, a public body, corporate and politic, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 11/22/1993--Introduced. Validates and confirms the conveyance of certain real property from the Southern Pacific Transportation Company, successor in interest to Southern Pacific Railroad Company, to the Redevelopment Agency, Tulare, California.
